name: Les aventures de Barry Straw
description:
[ENGLISH BELOW]

Laissez-vous entraîner dans les aventures de Mr Barry Straw. Cette fraise téméraire va vous plonger dans un jeu de plateforme en 3 niveaux qui vous amèneront ensuite à un jeu de création en pointer cliquer.

Je ne vous en dis pas plus, à vous de découvrir !

[ENGLISH]

The game is entirely in french but if you read this you will be able to play easily.

Mr Barry Straw is very sad...
The planet near by has been hit by a comet explosion which destroyed the city and some of its citizens.

His friend Kader, a victim if this disaster, is still alive but he is completely dismembered. The brave Barry has managed to locate his friend's pieces in three surrounding universes.

Find out a maximum of the objects to be able to build Kader back considering what you found.

Be careful of the beetles and the praying mantis,  avoid those to not lose any life.

Here are the commands to help you navigate:

  • MENU 1 & 2: story & tutorial

- Click on CONTINUER and then COMMENCER to access the game.

  • LEVEL 1, 2 and 3

- Use your left and right arrows on your keyboard to walk.

- Use your up arrow to jump.

- Use your down arrow to crouch.

  • LEVEL 4

- Point and click game.

- Chose an object on the right side.

- Drag it to the position you wish on the template in the middle.

- Release your click to place it.

- Validate your choice when you're satisfied with your creation by pressing  "Valider"

- Restart the level by pressing on "Recommencer"

Hope you enjoy the game ! :)
